warning.name: warning
warning.title: Color Status Warning
warning.description: Default warning status color. Used to display information that needs user’s attention and may require further steps.

highlight.name: highlight
highlight.title: Color Status Highlight
highlight.description: Default highlight status color. Used to highlight specific items in the interface.

danger.name: danger
danger.title: Color Status Danger
danger.description: Default danger status color. Used to communicate problems that have to be resolved so that user can continue forward. This color should be always used for e.g. highlighting errors.

success.name: success
success.title: Color Status Success
success.description: Default success status color. Used to convey success states. For example, you might show a success message that tells the user that changes were saved or something was completed.

info.name: info
info.title: Color Status Info
info.description: Default info status color. Used to convey general information that isn’t critical. For example, you might show an alert that asks for user feedback.

progress.name: progress
progress.title: Color Status Progress
progress.description: Default progress status color. Used to convey something that’s in progress.

neutral_weak.name: neutral_weak
neutral_weak.title: Color Status Neutral Weak
neutral_weak.description: Weak neutral status color. Used for the badge default state.
